ADAPTABILITY_DEF: Skill which determines how fast can a person change his methods to suit a new situation. e.g. learning a new programming language or work process for a new team or project.
COMMUNICATION_DEF: Associated with teamwork. It helps to solve problems faster and reduces the posibility of errors allowing an efficient flow through the development of a project.
PROBLEM-SOLVING_DEF: Skill that helps not only to find a solution but to find the most efficient one.
DEBUGGING_DEF: It helps to find errors and solving them. The better a person is at debugging the quicker the error will be solved.
